name: Empire of the Sands
description:
I made this game for a university project. It was developed entirely by myself during the 2nd semester of 2019.

In this game you command asmall army and try to defeat the enemy while managing your water and ore resources.

All programming was made by me, and most art was made by me. Exceptions are in the public domain, except for some SFX licensed via CC-BY, the attributions are in the file CREDITS.txt inside the downloadable .zip
